html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00982025-02-14PPC, PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectExclusion Approval Order for Certain Former Members of the Canadian Forces
PrecisEXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER FOR CERTAIN FORMER MEMBERS OF THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to exclude eligible former members of the Canadian Forces who completed their third year of service and were honourably released within the meaning of the regulations made under the National Defence Act during the period of November 13, 2020 to January 18 2024, and who had created a Public Service Resourcing System (GC Jobs) account before January 19, 2024, from the application of section 35.11 of the Public Service Employement Act relating to mobility entitlement.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2025-0020 Publication Date: 2025-02-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER FOR CERTAIN FORMER MEMBERS OF THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to exclude eligible former members of the Canadian Forces who completed their third year of service and were honourably released within the meaning of the regulations made under the National Defence Act during the period of November 13, 2020 to January 18 2024, and who had created a Public Service Resourcing System (GC Jobs) account before January 19, 2024, from the application of section 35.11 of the Public Service Employement Act relating to mobility entitlement.
